greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Array: row n shows the coefficients of the characteristic polynomial of the n-th principal submatrix of {max(i,j)} (A051125).
comment: Let p(n)=p(n,x) be the characteristic polynomial of the n-th principal submatrix.  The zeros of p(n) are real, and they interlace the zeros of p(n+1).  See A202605 for a guide to related sequences.
The characteristic polynomial seems be the recurrence relation given by p(n,x) = -x * p(n-1,x) + n * (-1)^(n-1) * sum_{i=0..n-1} x^i * binomial(2n-i-2,i). - _Enrique Pérez Herrero_, Jan 29 2013
reference: (For references regarding interlacing roots, see A202605.)
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Jan 09 2012
